wikipedia_page.main: John A'Bear (16 July 1913 – 3 October 1979) was an English rugby union player. He played club rugby for Gloucester and was their youngest captain. Although he never won a cap for England, he did tour Argentina with the British Isles team in 1936.

response: * John Gordon A'Bear, international rugby union player with the British and Irish Lions, and Gloucester's youngest ever captain
